title: Discord
description: I came to Discord around 2017. I really like to be best in everything I am there and in Discord I develop the first, best, open-source, indian economy discord-bot, soo it is very enjoyable for me.

title: Gaming
description: The gaming is a good way to exercise on your reflexes. I came to gaming around 2016 and been here for around 4 years and I love to play fps games on desktop and mobile devices and I also love the Championship event orgranised by them as I can see and fight with other skilled player.

title: Instagram
description: I came to Instagram around 2016 and I always wanted to work in social media, and the same thing happened on Instagram and I started producing content in this community.

title: Space
description: I love learning about space and the universe, and everything connected to it, like quantum physics, which proves a variety of dizzying theories, such as parallel universes, Continuity, singularity, time travel, black holes, and white holes.
